title: What is this NYTimes graphic?
content:
This was on an opinion page about the elections but we can’t figure out what it is.

[http://www.nytimes.com/2008/08/29/opinion/l29dems.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146/http:/www.nytimes.com/2008/08/29/opinion/l29dems.html "http://www.nytimes.com/2008/08/29/opinion/l29dems.html")

 [‹ These people don't even know they're driving me crazy.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49443 "Go to previous forum topic") [Inside "The Source of the Originals" ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49512 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content: I think it’s supposed to be a political compass.
I wondered it that was it. :-)

It says robots aren’t allowed to touch the flag.

hhp

Now that was funny, Hrant!

Sharon

The matchstick always points to the north east?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/match_3899.jpg)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/sparrow_4400.jpg)

Signs point to an Obama landslide?
The compass points to what we want most. ;^)

[Shirt-a-Day](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146/http:/www.shirtaday.com/) had a funny shirt this week. It was so popular that they kept it for a couple of days.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/20080828_nobama_5543.jpg)

Clever idea, nice design, but not my style.

In response to the NObama t-shirt, GObama is up for sale today. Grab it while you can at [http://www.shirtaday.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146/http:/www.shirtaday.com/ "http://www.shirtaday.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201101146im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/20080918_gobama_6598.jpg)

Could somebody please make a “VOTING IS NOT THE ANSWER” shirt?

hhp
